page.title: 05Local Facilities I
page.content: The village hall in Sutton Benger is the focal point for the local clubs and organisations. The main clubs are the Babysitting Circle; the Mother, Baby & Toddler Group; Playgroup; the Mothers Union; Brownies; Sunday School; the Sunday Football Club; the Women's Institute; and the Over 60s Club. Other organisations can be found in nearby towns, along with cinemas, theatres, sports facilities, shops etc. The village has two general grocery stores, a Post Office, two Public Houses, and a hotel/restaurant. The main industry is the Buxted Poultry chicken processing factory. There is also a market garden, a general builders, and a funeral directors.
